product_desc: Black solid innerwear vest has scoop neck and sleevelessFeatures:1.Anti Bacterial & Anti-Odour: The bacteriostatic bioagent called 'Bamboo Kun' fights bacterial growth on the fabric.It makes the vest 50% more odorless than its peers.Don't blame us if your cologne stays on your shirt all day long now.2.Feels like butter even after 100 washes.NEO-SKIN bamboo is 2X softer than cotton. The luxuriously smooth finish of the fabric stays with you, season after season. Feels so new every day, makes you forget when you purchased it.3.Moisture absorbent and Thermoregulating.Neo-Skin is composed to give you better moisture absorption and ventilation, helping you stay almost 2 degrees cooler in summers yet relatively warmer during winters. Switch between the cool dude and hot guy as per the occasion.4.Invisible Neck.A relatively deeper round neck that is designed to fall below your first open button, giving you the choices you didn't have before.5.A sustainable option. NEO-SKIN bamboo is much more sustainable than cotton because it is not only self-regenerating but also eliminates the use of pesticides.Feel good on the inside with your eco-friendly choice.

pdp_name: Men Bamboo Round Neck Vest DAM-VEST-NBL

product_desc: Men solid Black innerwear vest with Round Neck, leevelessKey Features:Everyday Essentials: XYXX men's vest is made from 100% Super Combed Cotton, a remarkably stronger, softer, and longer-lasting fabric than conventional cotton. The soft-on-skin texture of combed cotton delivers an ultra-soft innerwear experience. Because Comfort Matters: Our IntelliEase technology delivers luxurious comfort wear that promises unmatched softness and breathability. This combed cotton vest will always complement your lifestyle, whether you are lounging at home, traveling, or working at the office. Be it under a shirt or by itself, the Nova vest is engineered for lasting comfort and possesses high moisture absorbency properties. Maintains Skin Hygiene: Enhanced with an N9 Silver finish, the Nova vest has antimicrobial properties leading to longer-lasting freshness and odour-free comfort, making it ideal for a high-intensity workout session. All Day Wear: Tailored for a perfect fit, the Nova vest is an all-season wonder. Engineered for lasting comfort, this vest possesses high moisture absorbency. The Nova vest can be the perfect undershirt, workout vest, or a part of your beachwear when worn by itself. With exceptional breathability, the Nova vest is in a league of itself when it comes to versatility. From chilling at home to working out, this vest is the perfect fit for you. The ribbed texture on the vest makes for a smart & modern look

When it comes to finding the perfect garment that effortlessly combines style and comfort, Damensch's vests truly stand out.
First and foremost, the comfort provided by a well-crafted vest is unparalleled. The choice of high-quality fabric ensures a soft touch against the skin.

Damensch underwear is a remarkable blend of unmatched comfort, exquisite style, and impeccable craftsmanship. From the moment I started wearing their underwear, I was captivated by the softness, durability, and elegant designs. Damensch has set a new standard in the industry, surpassing my expectations in every aspect. If you're searching for underwear that offers supreme comfort, enduring quality, and timeless elegance, look no further than Damensch. Trust me, your wardrobe will thank you.

One of the best vests I have worn till date, and just to be clear, I'm 25, I have worn a lot of vests. None of them have this fit accordingly to the sizes listed. It's been close to a month since the purchase and the colour still stays the same after multiple washes. All in all great purchase! DAMENSCH!

product_desc: Assorted innerwear vest, has a round neck and sleevelessFeatures: Anti Bacterial & Anti-Odour: The bacteriostatic bioagent called 'Bamboo Kun' fights bacterial growth on the fabric.It makes the vest 50% more odorless than its peers.Don't blame us if your cologne stays on your shirt all day long now.Feels like butter even after 100 washes. NEO-SKIN fabric made of Bamboo rayon-93%, Elastane - 7% is 2X softer than cotton. The luxuriously smooth finish of the fabric stays with you, season after season. Feels so new every day, makes you forget when you purchased it.Moisture absorbent and Thermoregulating. Neo-Skin is composed to give you better moisture absorption and ventilation, helping you stay almost 2 degrees cooler in summers yet relatively warmer during winters. Switch between the cool dude and hot guy as per the occasion.Invisible Neck. A relatively deeper round neck that is designed to fall below your first open button, giving you the choices you didn't have before.A sustainable option. NEO-SKIN bamboo is much more sustainable than cotton because it is not only self-regenerating but also eliminates the use of pesticides. Feel good on the inside with your eco-friendly choice.Disclaimer: The final product delivered might vary in colour and prints from the display here

pdp_name: Men Bamboo Round Neck Vest DAM-VEST-BZ
